text: "Honky Tonk Blues" is a 1952 country song by Hank Williams and became a major hit for Charley Pride in 1980. It topped the country single charts in the United States and Canada. It has been covered by a number of country artists over the years. ==References== Category:1952 songs Category:Hank Williams songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Huey Lewis and the News songs Category:Dion DiMucci songs Category:Charley Pride songs
title: Honky Tonk Blues
